Question: This person's election ended twelve years of Republican rule of the White House and twenty of the previous twenty-four years.
Hints: This person was born William Jefferson Blythe III on August 19, 1946, at Julia Chester Hospital in Hope, Arkansas.
In the first primary contest, the Iowa caucus, this person finished a distant third to Iowa Senator Tom Harkin.
After Oxford, this person attended Yale Law School and earned a Juris Doctor (J.D.) degree in 1973.
